mapper.select: SELECT * FROM client ORDER BY client_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (client_num, client_name, client_type, contact_person, phone, email, address1, address2) VALUES (client_seq.nextval, #{client_name}, #{client_type}, #{contact_person}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET client_name=#{client_name}, client_type=#{client_type}, contact_person=#{contact_person}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2} WHERE client_num=#{client_num}
mapper.select: SELECT c.client_num, c.client_name AS name, COALESCE(SUM(d.quantity * d.unit_price), 0) AS sales FROM client c LEFT JOIN sales_order s ON c.client_num = s.customer_num LEFT JOIN sales_order_detail d ON s.sales_order_num = d.sales_order_num WHERE c.client_type = 1 GROUP BY c.client_num, c.client_name ORDER BY sales DESC
